    • Uses of Configuration in com.flowpowered.persistence.config

      Subinterfaces of Configuration in com.flowpowered.persistence.config 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  FileConfiguration
      Represents a configuration that loads from a file
      Classes in com.flowpowered.persistence.config that implement Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractConfiguration
      A basic implementation of Configuration using ConfigurationNodeSource method implementations from AbstractConfigurationNodeSource
      class  ConfigurationHolderConfiguration
      This is a configuration holder class that takes another Configuration and wraps some reflection to get all the fields in the subclass that have values of the type ConfigurationHolder.
      class  ConfigurationWrapper
      A parent class for implementations of Configuration that wrap other Configurations.
      class  MapBasedConfiguration
      A base class for configurations that load their values from a Map
      class  MapConfiguration
      This represents a configuration that loads its values from an in-memory Map
      Fields in com.flowpowered.persistence.config declared as Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Configuration AbstractConfigurationNodeSource.config 
      Methods in com.flowpowered.persistence.config that return Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration ConfigurationWrapper.getConfiguration() 
      Configuration ConfigurationNodeSource.getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration this node source is attached to.
      Configuration ConfigurationHolder.getConfiguration() 
      Configuration AbstractConfigurationNodeSource.getConfiguration() 
      Methods in com.flowpowered.persistence.config with parameters of type Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConfigurationWrapper.setConfiguration(Configuration config) 
      void ConfigurationHolder.setConfiguration(Configuration config)

    • Uses of Configuration in com.flowpowered.persistence.config.annotated

      Classes in com.flowpowered.persistence.config.annotated that implement Configuration 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotatedConfiguration 
      class  AnnotatedObjectConfiguration
      A configuration wrapper used to save annotated objects.
      class  AnnotatedSubclassConfiguration
      The base class for annotated configurations Annotated configurations are created by subclassing AnnotatedConfiguration and having fields annotated with "@Setting"
      Constructors in com.flowpowered.persistence.config.annotated with parameters of type Configuration
